title: Pret appoints new CMO - Retail Gazette
summary:
- Pret A Manger has appointed Matthew Bresnahan as its new Chief Marketing Officer, bringing 12 years of experience from Restaurant Brands International.
- Bresnahan will oversee global and localized marketing, product innovation, loyalty programs, customer insights, PR, and delivery channels.
- The appointment aligns with Pret's strategy to deepen customer relationships and expand its presence in the UK and US markets.
- The company plans to test new meal deal formats in the UK this autumn to enhance value and boost lunchtime sales.
- Retail executives should note the emphasis on insight-led marketing and product innovation as key drivers for growth in the competitive food-to-go sector.
